programme.title: The 1997 United Parcel Service strike
programme.short_synopsis: Do union strikes bring change? UPS and Air Traffic Controllers find out.
programme.medium_synopsis: The United Parcel Service (UPS) employees strike reminds Alistair Cooke of previous union demonstrations of power, including the disastrous 1981 Air Traffic Controllers strike.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
